metadata.title: CVE-2024-26594 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:validate mech token in session setup If client send invalid mech token insession setup request, ksmbd validate and make the error if it is invalid.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
